custom-action.name: runscenario
custom-action.description:
Run a Choas Monkey engineering scenario defined in Gremlin.
Possible parameters are: - Scenario (required): Name of the Gremlin Scenario to run Default value is "Name of the Gremlin Scenario to run". - GremlinToken (required): Gremlin API Token Default value is "Gremlin API Token". - GremlinTeamID (optional): Gremlin Team ID Default value is "Gremlin Team ID".
